REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0730 reute r f BC-FRANKLIN-RESOURCES-<B 03-13 0057

TEXT.TITLE: FRANKLIN RESOURCES <BEN> SAYS NET MAY DOUBLE
TEXT.BODY: Franklin Resources Inc said it believes earnings could double this year as compared to a year ago when the company reported income of 32 mln dlrs on 143 mln dlrs in revenues. Franklin Resources is a financial services company. Its fiscal year ends September 30. Reuter
